text:
Sonya Balmores (born June 23, 1986) is an American actress, model, and surfer. She was born in Kalaheo, Hawaii. She also competed in the Miss Teen USA pageant.
Balmores won the Miss Hawaii Teen USA title on May 16, 2004 at the Waikiki Sheraton Resort.
Balmores played the series regular role Kai Kealoha in "Beyond the Break". In 2017, Balmores was cast in the series "Inhumans" as Auran.
